description: Recipients of this badge have demonstrated mastery level achievement of the Written Communication competency as established by the College of business at Sample University.
name: Written Communication - Mastery

issuer.description:
Founded in 1899, Sample University is a world-class institution of higher education.

(Note: This badge issuer is intended for use in the IMS Global certification program.)
issuer.name: Sample University - College of Business

criteria.narrative:
The earner has demonstrated the following:

1. Information Acquisition
- Understand writing as a series of tasks including finding, evaluating, analyzing, and synthesizing appropriate primary and secondary sources.
- Understand the writing process as a social and often collaborative process.
- Know genre conventions ranging from structure and paragraphing to tone and mechanics

2. Application
- Use writing and reading for inquiring, learning, thinking, and communicating
- Use common formats for different kinds of texts and written tasks
- Achieve mastery of such features as syntax, grammar, punctuation, and spelling
- Use appropriate conventions of usage, specialized vocabulary, format and documentation
- Use multiple drafts to create and complete a successful text.
- Write and read texts written in several genres and for a variety of audiences.

3. Analysis
- Critique own and other's work.
- Develop flexible strategies for generating, revising, editing, and proofreading.
